text:
Granville is a city in Iowa in the United States. The population was 312 at the 2010 census.
History.
Granville was first found on the map in 1882. It was named after Richard Grenville. He is an English explorer. A post office called Granville began service from 1884 onwards.
Geography.
Granville is located at (42.984552, -95.875737).
The city has a total area of. This is based on the United States Census Bureau. All of the area is land.
